nodes.text: If the reason of the progressive effect of the union against US is only the fight against imperialism the progressive effect may be frustrated by the facts
Some are arguing that Bush's extremism actually has a progressive effect because it unites the world against US empire
But a world united against the United States isn't necessarily united against imperialism.
Despite their rhetoric France and Russia opposed the invasion of Iraq because it threatened their own plans to control Iraq's oil.
If the union against the US is an union against the imperialism the members of the union cannot have imperialistic goals
